value.title: Watch Elon Musk's AI brain chip startup Neuralink debut its massively hyped technology
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has consistently hyped up the research, but recent reports suggest the company has been wrestling with internal chaos.

value.title: TSMC announces its first 3nm AI chip customer – neither Apple nor Huawei

value.title: Latest NVIDIA SHIELD Update Brings AI Upscaling Enhancements And New Features
value.excerpt: Over and above the excellent hardware, NVIDIA has been religious about consistently releasing updates for the SHIELD TV that only make what was already a great device even better.

value.title: This tiny AI chip obliterates Google rival in a crucial metric
value.excerpt: Kneron, a startup from California, has introduced its new neural processing unit (NPU) for edge AI applications. The KL720 NPU promises to enable sophisticated AI-enhanced applications that do not use the cloud,

value.title: Kneron launches its new AI chip to challenge Google and others
value.excerpt: Fresh off a $40 million Series A round, edge AI specialist Kneron today announced the launch of its newest custom chip, the Kneron KL 720 SoC. With funding from the likes of Alibaba, Sequoia, Horizons Ventures,

value.title: Qualcomm-backed firm releases processor as AI chip race heats up
value.excerpt: Kneron Inc, a semiconductor startup backed by venture capital arms of Qualcomm Inc QCOM.O and Alibaba Group Holding Ltd BABA.N, on Thursday announced a new chip

value.title: ProteanTecs raises $45 million to apply AI to chip design and performance monitoring
value.excerpt: Startup ProteanTecs raised $45 million to further develop its AI chip design platform, bringing its total raised to nearly $100 million.

value.title: DDN Recognized for Innovation in Artificial Intelligence Data Management with 2020 AI Breakthrough Award
value.excerpt: AI Breakthrough, a leading market intelligence organization that recognizes the top companies, technologies and products in the global Artificial Intelligence (AI) market, today announced that DDN®, the global leader in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Data Management software and hardware solutions enabling Intelligent Infrastructure,

value.title: Baidu Is Searching For Quantum AI Advantage
value.excerpt: Baidu, China’s leading search engine and AI powerhouse, recently announced Paddle Quantum, a quantum machine learning development toolkit. This was the latest in a series of steps Baidu has taken to marry quantum computing with AI since establishing its Institute for Quantum Computing in 2018.

value.title: China Still Buying $300 Billion of Chips From U.S., Elsewhere
value.excerpt: China will import $300 billion of semiconductors for the third straight year, underscoring how the world’s No. 2 economy remains tied to America despite billions invested in local chip-making know-how.

value.title: SINTRONES Edge AI GPU Computing Solution enabling flexibility: EBOX-7000
value.excerpt: SINTRONES, one of the global leaders in computing technology in vehicles, announces the launch of the new EBOX-7000 Edge AI GPU Computing. The new EBOX-7000 Edge AI GPU Computing is suitable for various factory automation and Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) control system in large-scale processes such as mining and manufacturing.

value.title: Edge AI Chips for Voice-Activated Devices Save Power, Protect Privacy
value.excerpt: Machine learning startup Syntiant announced in early August that it had secured $35 million to push its processors forward.

value.title: DARPA Chip Effort Advances AI Hardware
value.excerpt: The Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency’s Electronics Resurgence Initiative (ERI) includes development efforts aimed at AI hardware components

value.title: Losses mount at British unicorn Graphcore as it pours cash into AI chips
value.excerpt: The Bristol-based company said it had almost doubled the size of its headcount to accelerate development of the technology

value.title: Microsoft Deploys AI ‘Supercomputing’ via Nvidia’s New Ampere A100 GPU
value.excerpt: Microsoft is ramping up a new set of AI instances for its customers. The new Nvidia Ampere-powered servers are powerful enough to qualify for supercomputer status, at least in some configurations.

value.title: Nvidia’s server business eclipses gaming chips for first time, though maybe not for long
value.excerpt: Nvidia Corp.’s data-center chips brought in more money than the gaming specialist’s core business for the first time in the company’s second quarter, but

value.title: Xilinx’s programmable AI chip powers safety sensors in Subaru car
value.excerpt: Xilinx said that its programmable AI chip has been used in the EyeSight safety system in the new Subaru Levorg vehicle.

value.title: Microsoft's New Azure Servers Deliver Powerful NVIDIA A100 Ampere AI Supercomputing Boost
value.excerpt: Therefore, Microsoft’s Azure is announcing their powerful ND A100 v4 virtual machine series. Each device will be kitted out with eight impressive NVIDIA Ampere A100 Tensor Core GPUs. The ND A100 v4 won’t work alone,

value.title: World’s largest chip gets beefier: 850 thousand cores for AI
value.excerpt: Announed at the Hot Chips 2020 conference, the new chip — which is as large as a single 300-mm wafer — packs over two times more transistors as well as a whopping number of AI-optimized cores. The Cerebras Wafer Scale Engine Generation 2 has a die size of approximately 46,

value.title: Cerebras puts ‘world’s largest computer chip’ in Lassen supercomputer
value.excerpt: Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory said it has integrated Cerebras Systems' wafer-scale computer chip into its Lassen supercomputer.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Adds A100 GPU Instances for ‘Supercomputer-Class AI’ in the Cloud
value.excerpt: Microsoft Azure continues to infuse its cloud platform with HPC- and AI-directed technologies. Today the cloud services purveyor announced a new virtual machine family aimed at “supercomputer-class AI,” backed by Nvidia A100 Ampere GPUs, AMD Eypc Rome ...

value.title: Cerebras teases second-generation wafer-scale AI chip
value.excerpt: The existing Gen-1 has 18 gigabytes of DRAM on die. Lie told the audience to wait for details "in coming months." Cerebras competes with established GPU heavyweight Nvidia and other startups such as Graphcore and Tachyum.

value.title: Intel: Data bandwidth, sparsity are the two biggest challenges for AI chips
value.excerpt: The movement of data into and out of the processor is the biggest challenge for AI chips, but sparsity looms as an even greater challenge, according to Intel engineers.

value.title: IBM POWER10 Mega Chip For Hybrid Cloud Is Revealed
value.excerpt: The IBM POWER architecture has always delivered high-performance computing for business-critical workloads and looking to build on that legacy, they’ve just released the POWER10, tilting toward support for cloud workloads.

value.title: IBM Inks Deal With Samsung to Build its Latest Chip Processor
value.excerpt: International Business Machines Corporation IBM recently unveiled its latest chip processor — IBM POWER 10 — which will be manufactured by Samsung Electronics. The chip is primarily meant for use across data center operations and will be based on Samsung’s 7-nanometer (nm) process technology.

value.title: Photonics startup Lightmatter details P1, its AI optical accelerator chip
value.excerpt: Ahead of the Hot Chips 2020 conference this week, photonics chip startup Lightmatter detailed its forthcoming P1 accelerator hardware.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Chip Market Forecast Report 2020 - 2027 - Top Key Players Analysis
value.excerpt: This report researches and evaluates the impact of COVID-19 outbreak on the market, including potential opportunities and challenges, drivers, and risks associated with the market. We present a detailed assessment of market growth based on numerous scenarios.

value.title: IBM unveils its first seven-nanometre chip for next-generation hybrid cloud computing
value.excerpt: IBM has announced the tenth generation of its flagship Power processors, a smaller, faster, more energy-efficient seven-nanometre chip that businesses can expect to deploy inside their data centres in the second half of 2021.

value.title: Elon Musk hints at Tesla’s not-so-secret Dojo AI-training supercomputer capacity
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has made a rare new comment about Tesla’s now not-so-secret ‘Dojo’ program to create an AI-training supercomputer and gave a hint of its capacity. Last year at Tesla’s Autonomy Day, the CEO first confirmed the existence of the ‘Dojo’ program: “We do have a major program at Tesla which we don’t have enough time

value.title: IBM unveils Power10 processor for big data analytics and AI workloads
value.excerpt: At the Hot Chips 2020 virtual conference, IBM unveiled the Power10, its first commercial 7-nanometer processor, manufactured by Samsung.
